backend.package.json: Dependencies and scripts for Node.js/Express backend
backend.server.js: Main Express server setup with MongoDB connection
backend.models/User.js: Mongoose schema definition for User entity
backend.models/Task.js: Mongoose schema definition for Task entity
backend.controllers/userController.js: Business logic and CRUD operations for User
backend.controllers/taskController.js: Business logic and CRUD operations for Task
backend.routes/users.js: API endpoints and route handlers for User
backend.routes/tasks.js: API endpoints and route handlers for Task

frontend.package.json: React dependencies including Axios, Tailwind CSS, Zustand
frontend.public/index.html: Root HTML template with proper meta tags
frontend.src/main.jsx: React DOM root and app initialization
frontend.src/store/appStore.js: Zustand global state management for application state
frontend.src/api/apiService.js: Axios configuration and API functions to interact with backend
frontend.src/components/Header.jsx: Reusable UI component for app header
frontend.src/components/TaskList.jsx: Reusable UI component for task list display
frontend.src/components/TaskForm.jsx: Reusable UI component for creating and editing tasks
frontend.src/pages/Dashboard.jsx: Main page component for user dashboard
frontend.src/hooks/useAuth.js: Custom React hook for handling authentication
frontend.src/hooks/useTaskData.js: Custom React hook for fetching and managing task data
